channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: Suspension of services during Christmas Holidays 2023/2024
item.description: The office will be available until Friday, 22 December 2023. Services will resume on Monday, 8 January 2023.%0APhone and e-mail support services will be suspended during this period.%0A

item.title: InformaStudenti service interruption
item.description: Due to a scheduled technological update of the platform, InformaStudenti service will be unavailable from Friday 15 December 2 pm to Monday 18 December 2 pm.%0AWe apologise for any inconvenience.%0A

item.title: Closure of Faculty Offices
item.description: The student offices for the Faculty will be closed from 27th to 29th December 2023.%0A

item.title: University Scholarships final rankings academic year 2023/24
item.description: The final rankings of the University Scholarships a.y. 2023/24 for students enrolled into successive years, in the first year of a Bachelor and the first year of a single-cycle master degree programme have been published.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: English language development course in view of the Cambridge C1 Advanced exam
item.description: Registration is open for the English language development course with a view to sitting the Cambridge C1 Advanced (CAE) exam. Classes, for the whole duration of 20 hours, are taking place in person between January and February at the SLAM Centre according to the calendar reported in the call.%0AüìÑ Read the call for further details

item.title: 2023-24 Student Survey
item.description: We have launched the student survey for the 2023-24 academic year. You can access the questionnaires from your Unimia page (box "Exams and Student Opinion).%0AFor information on the survey, visit the dedicated page "Course evaluation questionnaire".%0A

item.title: International Welcome Desk
item.description: As part of our commitment to supporting our international student community, we are pleased to introduce our new dedicated service, the International Welcome Desk that will support international students in presence and through MS Teams.%0AAll available information at the page International Students Office - Welcome Desk.%0A

item.title: CELI and CELI i exams - fees
item.description: Please find below the fees for CELI and CELI i exams.%0A%0A‚ñ∂Ô∏è Learn more on Unimi.it
